thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: MOVES- BNP Paribas, BMO Global, State Street, Lombard Odier

author: Reuters Editorial
title: MOVES- BNP Paribas, BMO Global, State Street, Lombard Odier
text:
March 26 (Reuters) - The following financial services industry appointments were announced on Monday. To inform us of other job changes, email moves@thomsonreuters.com.
BNP PARIBAS: France’s biggest bank on Monday said it recently named Bertrand Valet as head of financial sponsors coverage for continental Europe. [nL3N1R851G
BMO GLOBAL ASSET MANAGEMENT: The asset management firm, a unit of Canada’s Bank of Montreal, on Monday appointed Bart Kuijpers as managing director and head of its fiduciary management business, effective April.
STATE STREET GLOBAL ADVISORS: The investment management arm of State Street Corp, on Monday named Kathleen Gallagher head of ETF model portfolios for EMEA and Asia Pacific, effective immediately.
LOMBARD ODIER INVESTMENT MANAGERS: The asset management firm, a division of Swiss private bank Lombard Odier Group, on Monday named Nicole Crettenand as institutional sales manager.
WAHA CAPITAL: The chief executive of Abu Dhabi-listed Waha Capital was elected as chairman of the company’s board, the investment firm said on Monday.
Compiled by Nikhil Subba in Bengaluru
